page.title: 19Badgers.
page.content: In the woods around{Colburn}there are badgers.Late one night, I went down with a local badger expert.As we approached, we had to keep very quiet because badgers can hear very well.The badgers{sett}is near to the front of the path at the foot of a tree, but you can't see it unless you know what you are looking for.You should look for{tracks}of the badger in the mud, or for{paths}that go under bushes. Eventually a badger's black and white head popped up, then it went back into the sett and came out with three{cubs. They started to play around the paths they had made, then a boy who was with us took a flash photograph.The badger didn't mind that, but when he took two, one after the other, the badgers did not reappear . (J.Glover)
